name: Justice
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not the same as last night): if executed tomorow, they don't die.

name: Prosecutor
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

name: Daddy Warbucks
ability: There are fewer Outsiders in play. [-2 Outsiders]

name: Barista
ability: Each night, pick a player. They are sober, healthy, and recieve true information.

name: Dopplegãnger
ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

name: Fang Good
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes a good Fang Good & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

name: Goodfather
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Enabler
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are drunk tonight and tomorrow until dusk

name: Tranquil
ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. Evil recieves false starting info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

name: Human
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

name: Azure Woman
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon and turn evil.

name: Dimwit
ability: If the Demon dies, play for one more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

name: Yes Dashii
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.

name: Courtier
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are poisoned for 3 nights & 3 days.

name: Monk
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

name: Jailer
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

name: Pirate
ability: Each night, choose a player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

name: Philosopher
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: become them. If you duplicate an in-play character, they are drunk. You are still the Demon after you change characters.
